data.lyric:
[ti:Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) ]
[ar:Darlene Love]
[al:美国怪谭第2季 电视原声带 American Horror Story Season 2(Original Soundtrack) ]
[offset:0]
[00:17.77]The snow's coming down
[00:21.19]I'm watching it fall
[00:23.58]
[00:25.08]Lots of people around
[00:27.26]
[00:28.97]Baby please come home
[00:31.05]
[00:32.63]The church bells in town
[00:35.06]
[00:36.50]All singing in song
[00:38.94]
[00:40.26]Full of happy sounds
[00:42.52]
[00:44.04]Baby please come home
[00:46.24]
[00:47.08]They're singing "Deck The Halls"
[00:49.57]
[00:50.30]But it's not like Christmas at all
[00:53.62]
[00:54.69]'Cause I remember when you were here
[00:57.81]
[00:58.34]And all the fun we had last year
[01:01.65]
[01:03.10]Pretty lights on the tree
[01:05.23]
[01:06.41]I'm watching them shine
[01:08.95]
[01:10.87]You should be here with me
[01:12.76]
[01:14.50]Baby please come home
[01:16.90]
[01:32.59]They're singing "Deck The Halls"
[01:35.60]
[01:36.52]But it's not like Christmas at all
[01:39.36]
[01:40.13]'Cause I remember when you were here
[01:43.08]
[01:43.72]And all the fun we had last year
[01:47.41]
[01:48.72]If there was a way
[01:50.69]
[01:52.56]I'd hold back this tear
[01:55.22]
[01:56.32]But it's Christmas day
[01:58.10]
[01:59.48]Please
[02:00.28]
[02:01.36]Please
[02:02.16]
[02:03.20]Please
[02:03.99]Please
[02:04.80]Please
[02:05.12]
[02:05.80]Please
[02:06.15]
[02:06.82]Baby please come home
[02:08.94]
[02:10.42]Baby please come home
[02:12.12]
[02:14.25]Baby please come home
[02:17.34]
[02:18.13]Baby please come home
